title: Simple Ways to Unfollow on TikTok: Unfollowing Limits & Fixes

steps.title: There is no free way to quickly unfollow everyone on TikTok.
steps.content: There is no free way to quickly unfollow everyone on TikTok. Apps like FuelTok seemed like fantastic apps to mass unfollow, but there are many reports of scam behavior and having credit card numbers stolen. Mass unfollow apps may claim to do exactly what you need them to do, but then end up stealing your login information and hacking your TikTok account instead. These apps may have been legitimate in the past, but have since fallen into disuse. Fueltok is no longer allowed in the Google Play Store and their website's security certificate is long expired.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. Tap white music note on a black background on your phone or tablet's home screen. This is the safest way to unfollow accounts on Android and iPhone. TikTok makes it very easy to unfollow people with a single tap, so unfollowing everyone won't take as long as you think.

steps.title: Tap the profile icon .
steps.content: Tap the profile icon . This icon in the lower right corner will open your profile.

steps.title: Tap Following.
steps.content: Tap Following . It's below your profile picture. This opens a list of all the people you follow.

steps.title: Tap Following next to a person you want to unfollow.
steps.content: Tap Following next to a person you want to unfollow. This instantly unfollows the person. The "Following" button will turn into Follow when you unfollow the account. Because unfollowing users on TikTok is so fast, you can speed through your list to mass unfollow quickly! [1] X Research source TikTok users will not be notified when you unfollow them. However, their "Followers" number will decrease, and they will be able to see this.

steps.title: You can safely unfollow about 200 accounts per day.
steps.content: You can safely unfollow about 200 accounts per day. If you unfollow more than 200 people in one day, you risk getting shadowbanned on TikTok .

steps.title: While there are some unfollowing services, they aren't free.
steps.content: While there are some unfollowing services, they aren't free. Socialpire is software you can use to mass unfollow accounts automatically on TikTok, but it isn't cheap. Socialpire offers to unfollow your "Following" in a way that won't trigger the spam or bots alert at TikTok that gets your account shadowbanned. Competitor apps may charge less (or claim to be free), but they can be risky.
